extendedInfo.description: The goal of Infinite dungeon is simple. Work your way from floor to floor searching for the stairway down to the next level while dispatching monsters and improving your equipment.Infinite Dungeons levels are procedurally generated and are different every time you play but just to mix things up there are also over 75 pre-designed levels that the game will switch in which contain additional features like keys, doors and switches.Infinite Dungeon IncludesOver 80 different enemiesOver 75 Designed levelsOver 120 Unique Items38 spells3 difficulty settings4 Races and 3 ClassesMultiple Tiered achievementsFinally the game features end of section bosses on level 10,25,50,75 and 100! Infinite Dungeon is a Rogue Like / Roguelike at heart but has been designed so that anyone can enjoy it and with a control scheme that suits touch. All that's left is to ask is how far into the Infinite Dungeon can you delve?(!!Note) - There is a known issue with the Galaxy S3 which may also affect other high resolution phones. The controls do not display correctly and it crashes in landscape. please try the demo first to ensure it runs acceptably. You can change the control method from the menu and play in portrait to somewhat get around the problem but it is far from ideal.

reviews.title: Awesome App!!!
reviews.comment: Fantastic!  Old school feel with modern graphics and touchsceen.  Hours and hours of play here.  Very well done app!  Lots of drops!  And you don\'t have to worry about food!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Excellent
reviews.comment: Fantastic game! I play it for hours. I hope there\'s more information about it online. Like what is better a sword that is 2 with critical 4 or a sword that is 6 with nothing else?
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great
reviews.comment: Good game In the making cld use more features but is already a nice roguelike.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Wtf
reviews.comment: Ok... so it doesnt aim where i aim, doesnt hit where i hit and mpstly doesnt walk where i want him to walk. Dumb, dumb, dumb. Dont donate and buy it. Waste completly.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Unique
reviews.comment: This game is\342\200\246\342\200\246 what can i say ?? Its Awesome!! Plz Update it
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Brings back the days of Moria....
reviews.comment: If you\'re looking for a very simple dungeon crawler, you can\'t beat this one. Loads fast, plays with no glitches so far. I concur that an ability to buy and sell would be cool. Fun and easy to play. You can\'t go wrong.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: It\'s about time I leave this a proper review
reviews.comment: I\'ve been playing this game for at least a year now.  As far as casual rogue likes go on mobile devices, this game is the tops.  Inclusion of qwerty keys is so greatly appreciated. Amazing game.  Many times over worth the purchase.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Awesome game
reviews.comment: The dungeon is really good. Been playing for too many levels! Very addicting.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Love it
reviews.comment: Simple but engaging, perfect pastime for us turn based addicts.  Only bad thing is I just got a new phone and short of rooting I have to start over.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Brilliant
reviews.comment: This RPG is fantastic. If you like old school RPG games you will love this. Hard to put down !! Loot, puzzles, monsters, mazes you can\'t go wrong. Great fun !!
reviews.author: Simon Cronk

reviews.comment: The game is lots of fun, but after only a few plays it crashes immediately on startup. It will not work unless i reinstall.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Best dungeon crawl ever
reviews.comment: Easily the best dungeon crawl game I\'ve played on Android. Very addictive. Spent quite a few hours playing it already, and plan to enjoy for many more.  Only issue is it crashes in landscape on my Nexus 7.  Also just found that after clearing level 100 for the first time on my Samsung Charge, it force closes when I  try to view achievements.  Please fix.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Addictive and Well Done Roguelike
reviews.comment: I positively love this game. It\'s simple but involving, and very well done. I just can\'t stop playing it. Best graphical Roguelike on Android.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Addictive fun
reviews.comment: Reminiscent of early RPG\'s like rogue, larn, etc. User interface could be better, but still hours of good fun. No long, annoying story lead-in and slow, overdone graphics like so many others.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Pretty fun game
reviews.comment: Been playing it all week at work - up to floor 63 now. It\'s a fun game for being so simple. There are some balancing issues (mainly a few creatures that lack balance when in large numbers), a lack of description on stats (which is better, 10 damage or 10 armor pen?) and an annoying bug where an enemy\'s remains can destroy your exit; however, even with all of that, it\'s still an addicting game.    I\'m giving it a 4* overall; the balancing issues and lack of stat information keep it from a 5.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: I want so bad to rate five but needs option to unlearn spells and fix bug where creature remains desroy trap
reviews.author: Mike King

reviews.title: Careful
reviews.comment: There\'s a glitch where enemies that leave remains can destroy the stairs to the next level.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Addictive Roguelike Joy
reviews.comment: Just superb. Forget the bad gfx this is so playable.  Reminds me of the old board game Heroquest. If you love rpgs get it!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Love it!
reviews.comment: I can\'t stop playing it. Its simple and fun. There is a few things I dont like but hay I don\'t mind it for a good game.
reviews.author: Jaymes Raine

reviews.title: Amazing game!
reviews.comment: Great game! To bad there\'s no merchant though, so I can sell extra items rather than destroy them. 5 stars, but barely, the lack of ANY sounds sucks.
reviews.author: A Google User
